Looking at Instacart data. 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")

instacart_df = 
  instacart %>%
  na.omit(instacart) %>% #omitting any NA
  select(order_id, add_to_cart_order, reordered, user_id, order_dow, order_hour_of_day, product_name) %>% #Selecting variables
filter(reordered == "0") #Only 1st time orders, not re-orders will be shown

unique(instacart_df$order_dow)
```
